00020 #ifndef CCNL_NONE
00021 
00022 /**
00023  * Levels for deciding whether or not to log.
00024  */
00025 #define CCNL_NONE       0   /**< No logging at all */
00026 #define CCNL_SEVERE     3   /**< Severe errors */
00027 #define CCNL_ERROR      5   /**< Configuration errors */
00028 #define CCNL_WARNING    7   /**< Something might be wrong */
00029 #define CCNL_INFO       9   /**< Low-volume informational */
00030 #define CCNL_FINE      11   /**< Debugging */
00031 #define CCNL_FINER     13   /**< More debugging */
00032 #define CCNL_FINEST    15   /**< MORE DEBUGGING YET */
00033 
00034 #endif
